title: Interpretation of dreams about water and interpretation of a dream about drinking water by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream: Seeing water is one of the visions that leaves a good impression on its owner. This vision has many connotations that vary based on many factors, including that the water can be salty or fresh, it can be cold or hot, and the water can be from the sea or from a well or Zamzam water. What concerns us in this article is to clarify all the indicators and special cases of seeing water. In a dream. Interpretation of a dream about water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dream water. Seeing water represents peace, purity, energy, a feeling of passion and vitality, and the ability to free the mind from negative thoughts and evil thoughts that drain vitality and kill the spirit of creativity. If one sees water in a dream, this indicates a psychological and emotional state. And the influence of the subconscious mind on consciousness and real life and the tendency towards imagination and the afterlife in which the dreamer satisfies his desires. This vision also indicates lawful and net profit, achieving many desired goals, and the ability to achieve a high rank among people and a good CV. Also, seeing water indicates On the money that the dreamer earns after perseverance and struggle and the fruits that he reaps as a reward for his patience, hard work, and mature thinking. If the monarch sees that he is drinking water, this is a sign of a good life, enjoyment of health, freedom from many worries and pains, and the return of the water to its natural course. And if he sees If a person drinks water after being extremely thirsty, this indicates the spaciousness and comfort of life, and the situation has changed for the better. And if he is poor, God will enrich him, make his affairs easy for him, open all doors before him, remove distress and poverty, and achieve many gains that will pave the way for him to achieve success. All of its goals. Interpretation of dreams about water by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing water means the sound instinct, the right religion, the right approach, the acquisition of science and knowledge, the saturation of experience, and the enjoyment of insight and wisdom. This vision also shows fertility, prosperity and prosperity, attaining a distinguished position and occupying high positions and high status. And a profitable business through which the dreamer achieves many of his previous goals. If he sees water in his dream, this is evidence of the blessing of lawful money and the enjoyment of various experiences and skills that will help him get out of all the crises he faces simply. If the dreamer sees that he is drinking water, this is evidence of Marriage in the near future, that is, if he is single, then the water shows life, sperm, renewal, and diving into the depths of adventures. And whoever is sick, this vision indicates recovery and convalescence in the coming days, the end of the period of adversity and adversity, and the restoration of health and recovery from the bed of illness. If someone sees that he Walking on water, this symbolizes vanity, pride, and superiority over others and confirms magic and display of power. But the vision of washing with water expresses cleansing from sins, healing from diseases, paying off debts, achieving goals, freedom from restrictions, and calm after panic and anxiety. Interpretation of dreams, water for

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn according to scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jinn in a dream. Seeing a jinn is one of the visions that causes a feeling of extreme panic in the fortuneteller, making him rush to search for different interpretations and connotations of seeing good or evil. About magic and envy, we will tell you the consequences of thinking in this article.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jinnImam Nabulsi says that seeing jinn in a dream is a symbol of traitorous owners who enter the dreamer’s house. As for the vision in the form of a person you know, it is a warning to that person’s fortune teller. Seeing the jinn in the form of a small child is one of the visions that express life’s many problems and the burden of worries. The vision also expresses many temptations, and the dreamer must be careful and cling to getting close to God Almighty. If the dreamer sees that he is teaching the jinn the Holy Qur’an and they memorize it, then it is a happy vision that indicates the strength of faith, the strength of the dreamer, and his control over all matters. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jinn Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of jeans in a dream is a vision that expresses a personality that has many talents and abilities that It makes her able to achieve success quickly, but she does not benefit from these talents. The vision also expresses the presence of enemies near the dreamer and they carry feelings of hatred and hatred towards him. If the jinn is Muslim, then it is a symbol of blessing and kindness and the woman’s soon transition to a married man. Seeing jeans expresses many Trips and journeys to search for science and gain a lot of knowledge in life, but seeing at home is a symbol of thieves who want to steal from you and you should beware of them. Interpretation of a dream about jeans that a single woman sees Some jurists believe that jeans in an unmarried woman’s dream are evidence of psychological fears that the girl feels as a result Loneliness, isolation, and extreme anxiety about the future. The dream of an unmarried woman wearing jeans is a vision that alerts her to the necessity of reading the Holy Qur’an and performing ruqyah to get rid of the evil spirits that surround her. If an unmarried girl sees the presence of a monster in her life and rejects him or keeps him out of her life, then this vision It is a bad dream that indicates the presence of a young man in her life with bad morals. If an unmarried woman sees that she is reading the Holy Qur’an in the presence of a jinn, then this vision shows the strength of the girl’s character and her continuous effort to get closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a married woman’s jeans: The jinn in a married woman’s dream was interpreted by Ibn Shirin means falling into a big problem or crisis, but he will be able to solve it soon. Imam Nabulsi says that seeing the jinn and feeling extreme fear and terror from him is a vision related to many bad things related to their health or serious financial problems. Seeing a married woman wearing jeans is a vision that indicates Many problems and disagreements between her and her husband, as it is a metaphor for financial crises and instability in marital life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing jeans for a pregnant woman: Seeing jeans in dreams for a pregnant woman is a metaphor for the bad thoughts that she often has during this period, and it is a vision resulting mainly from fear and anxiety. The extreme and

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s period in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the husband’s period in a dream In case we want to know the interpretation of the dream about the husband’s period in a dream, one of the dreams is very disturbing, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must be forbidden and not believe in the absolute, because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach The truth is that they can make mistakes and can be beaten, in addition, the site and its administrators have nothing to do with explanations. Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s period in a dream: Dreaming about a husband’s menstruation in a dream indicates many good things that will come to him by God’s grace. This vision may be a sign of entering into a new project with a stranger. It is possible that this dream is evidence of blessing and diet. The halal that the husband can obtain, thanks to God. A dream about a husband during his menstrual period may indicate good luck and relief from the worries that he has suffered from for a while. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish for the husband in a dream: Eating fish in a dream may indicate the extensive diet that the husband may obtain during this period. If a woman sees that her husband was eating fish, this may indicate positive changes that occurred in his life during this period. Seeing him eating fish in a dream may indicate happy events that the husband may receive in the coming days. If a person sees himself eating fish in a dream This may indicate that he is afflicted with a disease, and then he gets rid of it at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband running on green land in a dream: Seeing his wife working on green land may mean that she will get a lot of money in those days. Whoever dreams that the husband was running on Green land may indicate great wealth that he can acquire after the poverty he suffered from. Dreaming of a husband running on green land in a dream may indicate repentance for the sins and disobedience committed by the husband, and God knows best. When you see your wife lying on green land in a dream, it may indicate This indicates positive changes occurring in your life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream: A husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream may indicate that he will obtain a lot of halal money during this period. Eating his wife’s meat in a dream could indicate To achieve power or promotion at work during this time, and God knows best. If one sees a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream, this may indicate many changes that occur in those days, thanks to God. Seeing a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream may indicate Indicating that she is a woman of good character and appearance, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a husband drinking milk in a dream: If you see a husband eating milk in a dream, this may indicate that he is a person who helps others a lot in their lives. Dreaming that a husband eats milk in a dream may indicate the coming goodness of the marriage with grace God. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband was drinking milk, may indicate that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she has suffered from for a long time. Perhaps seeing her husband eating milk in the dream indicates positive changes that will occur.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a piece of paper with a person’s full name written on it in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you the interpretation of seeing a piece of paper with a person’s full name written on it in a dream. This vision shows the subconscious thought of a person whose name is written on a piece of paper. The disease that afflicts the dreamer and then saves him from it. It is normal for a person to see a strange and unrealistic dream in his sleep, which leads to anxiety and psychological distress. We have collected for you all the interpretations from translation books and great insights. Here, dear followers, we will explain to you that you see a piece of paper bearing the full name of a person in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a person’s full name written in a dream. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that in a dream a person writes a full person’s name on a piece of paper, which indicates that his worries It has ended. Also, dreaming of a piece of paper on which a person’s name is written indicates that sins and transgressions have been committed with that person and the loss of livelihood and money. Seeing a card bearing the name of a dead person in a dream indicates a malignant disease that haunts the dreamer and the death of a loved one. Interpretation of a vision Yourself writing your full name and signature in a dream. If a person sees in his dream that he is writing his name and waiting for him, this indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and the high position he will reach. Also, seeing someone writing his name and signing it indicates his marriage to a good and close girl, as well as a higher position. Also, seeing someone writing his name and signing it indicates his marriage to a good and close girl, as well as a higher position. This vision indicates the immediate pregnancy of the pregnant woman, and it also indicates that her husband will be able to enter a new job and earn money. Representation: Seeing a strange signature in a dream for a girl indicates the collapse of her worries, but after a lot of fatigue, hardship, and struggle with life. What is the interpretation of seeing a piece of paper with writing on it? The name of God? Seeing the paper on which the entire word of God is written in a dream is good news, happiness and abundance of sustenance that will dominate the dreamer. Also, seeing the name of God written on a piece of white paper in a dream is a sign of the end of sorrows and worries and freedom from troubles. The interpretation of Seeing God’s name written in a dream is full of good visions that indicate the recovery of the sick, the return of the absent, and the release of the prisoner. What is the interpretation of writing the name on the wall? If a married woman sees in her dream a small child written on the wall, this indicates the approaching pregnancy of the married woman, and God knows best. As Seeing a stranger’s name written on the wall indicates the deception of one of his friends and indicates losses in his money. Seeing one of his friends’ names written on the wall indicates that the dreamer’s problems will disappear, good company and repentance to God for sins. This vision also expresses that the person named is in a state. If one dreams in a dream that his name is mentioned in the sky, this indicates the disappearance of his worries, happiness, enjoyment, and many of his joys. Seeing the name mentioned in the sky indicates the fulfillment of one’s desires and goals. It also indicates great success and distinction in the next life. title: Interpretation of a dream about makeup on the face and eyes

preview.html: As for the interpretation of makeup in a dream, follow us for more interpretations through gptafser.com/, the largest dream interpretation website in the world. Interpretation of seeing makeup on the face and eyes in a dream for a single girl. Seeing makeup on the face in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that the dreamer has self-esteem and confidence. The dream also expresses the dreamer’s ability to manage things and how to deal with others. Whoever saw in her dream that she was wearing both eye and face makeup. She has energy and a great desire to change for the better and develop herself to have a successful future and a prominent position. It is also said that eye makeup in a dream For an unmarried woman. Evidence that the dreamer has a correct view of people and can distinguish between goodness and deception. Wearing a lot of makeup in a dream is evidence that the dreamer suffers from a lack of self-confidence and lacks attention from those around her. Seeing eyeliner in a dream means achieving goals and ambitions. Desired. Whoever wears cosmetics in a dream and sees herself as ugly, this is a sign of her bad morals. The dream may be an expression of the dreamer deceiving those around her with an unrealistic personality that does not represent her deepest thoughts and intentions. If a single woman dreams of an unknown man doing her makeup, then there is someone who admires her. He will propose to her soon. If she sees someone she does not know putting eyeliner on her, she should be careful, because there are also those who are trying to cheat her out of her money. Applying red powders on the cheeks in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that the dreamer is trying to attract someone’s attention. And everyone who She wears makeup and looks beautiful in her sleep. She may get engaged soon, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about putting on makeup for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing makeup on the face and eyes in a dream for a married woman. Seeing makeup on the face in an organized manner in a dream for a married woman. However, the dreamer fully fulfills her duties towards Her husband and children to the fullest. She always seeks to meet their demands at the expense of herself. If a woman puts on makeup in front of her husband in a dream and he looks at her with admiration. It is a sign of the husband’s approval, love and appreciation for his wife’s efforts. The dream also shows that their lives are full of friendliness, understanding and contentment. A lot of cosmetics in a dream is not good. It expresses the dreamer’s feeling of sadness and sadness. She is trying to hide what is inside her so that it does not affect her children because she is not happy with her husband. When a married woman sees in her dream, she buys a lot of cosmetics and makeup. It is a sign of Improvement in the material conditions of the pioneer, and the beginning of a new life full of luxury and well-being. If a woman sees that her husband applies makeup to her in a dream. He helps her with household chores, takes care of the children and always supports her. If she sees a stranger doing her makeup, then she needs help with something, and God knows best. Interpretation Seeing makeup on the face and eyes in a dream about a man and its meaning. title: What is the interpretation of seeing books in a complete dream for a woman and a man?

preview.html: The complete interpretation of seeing books in a dream is based on the main interpretation books and jurisprudence scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Only in the dream is it completed, you must follow the article. Interpretation of a dream about a book by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that when a single young man dreams of writing a complete book in a dream, this indicates a change in his life for the better, God willing. But if what he saw in this dream was a married man, this indicates On kindness, food, and material profit, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing complete books in a dream always means that a lot of money will come to the dreamer, and God knows best. Why do you dream of seeing books about poor women? It is said: If an unmarried woman sees her marriage contract or a marriage contract with one of her mahrams, this indicates Goodness, blessing and blueness. If an unmarried girl sees her marriage contract complete, this indicates that God will give her a good husband. And if she and an unmarried girl had a dream, a book was written in a dream about a stranger and a stranger, then this is a harbinger for her and a sign of kindness and happiness, which You will soon feel calm, and God knows best. Interpretation from the dream book From the dream book for married womenThey say that seeing a married woman in a dream, Kamel, and marrying an unknown person, is evidence of comfort and support, as well as removing pain from her and her husband, and God knows best. But if she sees in a dream that Kamel is writing Her letter to her husband while she feels happy, this indicates happiness and kindness. But if a married woman sees in a dream that she will marry one of her mahrams, this indicates a disaster that will soon befall her, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream book about a pregnant woman: They say that when a pregnant woman is seen reading while sitting with Someone you might know. This indicates ease of pregnancy and ease of childbirth, God willing. But if the pregnant woman sees that she is writing her book about one of her relatives or mahrams, this indicates that she and her child will benefit and be provided for, and God knows best. A man wrote a book in a complete dream. A single young man wrote a book about his bride in a complete dream that witnesses the end of their eternal happiness. And his close marriage with her. In addition, seeing a married man write about a woman who is not his wife is a sign that the dreamer will have many good things in his next life. The book was written in a dream by a divorced woman. To dream of books written for divorced women is a wave of goodness and happiness that will save her from problems and troubles in her life. Coming.Such visions in a divorced woman's dream indicate that she will put an end to her quarrels with her husband or that she will find a husband who will become the reason for many happy changes for her.The book was written in a dream for the brideA dream book in which a book is written about the desired visions for the engaged girl, showing her the completeness of commitment to good And safety. The interpretation of dreams, in which a book is written about a girl’s fiancé or another person, is also a vision of goodness, comfort and freedom from problems. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the visions website roy2a.com. Prayer is one of the important pillars of Islam. Without it, his life was destroyed, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our topic about the girl. The single woman, the married woman, the pregnant man, the young man, and the divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a woman praying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates God’s response to all of the dreamer’s prayers and his interest in the teachings of his religion. Seeing prayer in a dream indicates the collapse of anxiety and the fortuneteller’s circumstances will change for the better as soon as possible. Possible. Seeing interest in praying in a dream is a statement of paying his debts and his interest in returning the trust to its owners. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car repaired in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing praying on a chair in a dream? Seeing praying on a chair in a dream This indicates that he is very conscientious in his work and that he was promoted by his manager Seeing praying on a chair does not need to indicate his belief in God’s approval and acceptance of his prayers. Seeing praying on the side is no excuse, a sign of serious ill health. What is the interpretation of seeing the direction of prayer in a dream? Seeing the direction of prayer in a dream The direction of the Kaaba indicates his extremist religion, his high morals, and his interest in implementing the teachings His religion. Seeing prayer facing the qiblah in a dream indicates a strong system, careful attention to its timings, and the organization of his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer completed in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream by Ibn Shaheen? Seeing prayer in a dream by Ibn Shaheen is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate goodness and livelihood. The owner of the vision removes distress and eliminates poverty. Seeing long prostrations in prayer is a sign of the fulfillment of ambitions and the fulfillment of all desires. Seeing people kneeling in prayer, it indicates distance from the corrupt path and freedom from all sin. Seeing ablution for prayer, which indicates an abundance of blessings in the life of the dreamer, and the preparation of special documents. By holding Hajj rituals and starting major projects and investments. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone leading prayer in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for Imam Nabulsi? Seeing prayer in a dream for Nabulsi. Holding Friday prayer is evidence of a bad psychological state due to many problems and responsibilities. Seeing Friday prayer in a dream indicates success. At work and increasing livelihoods. Seeing interest in prayer in a dream indicates his success in completing his affairs and achieving goals. What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single girl? Seeing a single girl praying in a dream indicates good circumstances and high morals and is characterized by extreme generosity and extravagance. Seeing Istikharah prayer in a dream is a meaning. On a complete change in the fortuneteller’s circumstances and the imminent marriage. Seeing interest in prayer in a dream is an indication of moving from bad to better. Seeing a single girl praying in a dream is an indication of achieving goals and achieving great ambitions. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone leading prayer in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a man and woman praying for people? In a dream? Seeing a man and a woman

title: Interpretation of seeing myself in a dream as a bride

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing myself as a bride in a dream or a dream through the Vision roy2a.com website. Every girl basically wishes to become a bride and dreams of this day when she wears the white dress and sees the girl who is a bride with her. The dream may arouse her curiosity to know the meaning of this dream, as seeing a married woman as a bride may invite her to wonder and desire to interpret and learn the interpretation of this dream, whether she is single or married. We show the interpreters’ differences in their interpretation according to the state of insight and her circumstances, whether she is single, married, or pregnant, and according to the details. Vision and today, through the Vigina website, we will return to the interpretation of seeing a bride in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing myself as a bride according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a girl as a bride in a dream without a groom says that she is constantly thinking In her marriage and she is afraid of that. Seeing a girl who is a bride and sad in a dream indicates that she loves someone who is not suitable for her or that she is thinking about making a decision about someone she would like to have a relationship with. Seeing a girl who is a bride wearing a dirty wedding dress shows that she will have problems with the person who will be with her. A relationship with him. See also: A written prayer book is written for newlyweds. What is the psychological interpretation as a bride for a single woman? Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream as a bride announces that she will achieve her goals and desires. Seeing an unmarried woman as a bride wearing white, dancing and music indicates what will happen to her of her sadness and displays her condition Psychological harm. Seeing an unmarried woman as a bride and knowing the groom and being satisfied with him indicates that she will hear good news or that she will succeed in her academic or professional life. Seeing an unmarried woman as a bride and looking for her dress in a dream shows her confusion, trembling, and inability to solve important issues in her life. See Also: Interpretation of seeing a bride in a dream. What is the psychological interpretation as a bride for a married woman? Seeing a married woman as a bride in a dream for someone she knows indicates the next good for her and her family in the near future. Seeing a married woman as a bride in a dream for an unknown person indicates the crises and difficulties that she will face in her life. Seeing a woman A married woman wearing a wedding dress in a dream indicates the beginning of a new and better phase in her life. Seeing a married woman wearing a wedding dress in a dream may indicate the success of her children in their studies. Seeing a married woman as a bride with music and dancing indicates problems that may lead to separation from her husband. See also Interpretation of seeing three grooms in a dream: What is the interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to her husband: Seeing a married woman as a bride and her husband in a dream as a groom indicates the love and good relationship that binds them in reality. Seeing a married woman as a bride and her husband in a dream as a groom is an indication of the approaching pregnancy of a child, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of myself as a bride for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman as a bride in a dream shows that she will give birth easily, safely, and without problems. Seeing a pregnant woman as a bride for someone she knows in the presence of a husband

title: Interpretation of a dream about leaving his daughter behind

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing that I left his daughter in a dream about a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees that she has given birth to a girl. This symbolizes the strength of the girl that distinguishes her, so that the things she wants and her dreams are sufficient for her. The birth of a beautiful girl in a dream for an unmarried woman. An example of her intensity of patience in the face of the difficulties that she faces. It falls within her. It could be problems, judgments, or trials from God. And the girl seeing the girl’s death after giving birth in her dream. It symbolizes the failure that she gets from a love relationship that she enters into with an inappropriate man characterized by deception. As for the case in which the unmarried woman saw herself giving birth A girl in a dream. It symbolizes the relief that God has sent for her to pass the great test she fell into and there is no one to help her. It does not bode well for an engaged girl to see the birth of a girl in her dream. It may be a sign of her separation from her fiancé because of the problems she faces and may lead her to Betrayal, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl with teeth. Interpretation of seeing me leaving behind his daughter in a dream about a married woman. If the married woman is old and has a married girl and she sees herself giving birth to a girl in her dream. Good news for her daughter that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. In case A woman is not pregnant and saw herself giving birth to a girl who is not beautiful. A sign of health contraindications that prevent pregnancy. A woman sees herself giving birth to a girl who is already menstruating. This dream shows her bad psychological state due to the pressures she went through. Giving birth to a girl in a dream for a married woman, but she was dissatisfied with her. A sign of sadness that she hides from others and hides within herself. The woman may be pregnant in her dream, but in reality she is not. It indicates things that are happening in her life that cause her sadness and anxiety. She must commit to prayer and seeking forgiveness until what is in her heart goes away. And death. A girl born to a married woman is not worthy of praise and symbolizes disagreements and conflicts with her family. It could be a vision of a beautiful female giving birth to a married woman. It announces that she will become pregnant soon, if any problems occur that prevent her pregnancy, and God knows best. Giving birth to a beautiful girl in a dream for a married woman. It is best for her to She will pay off her husband’s debts, God willing. The birth of a beautiful girl in a dream is evidence of an improvement in their financial situation. The appearance of happiness when she gives birth to the girl she gave birth to symbolizes a married life surrounded by happiness. Seeing a married woman giving birth to a beautiful girl indicates a good sign of beauty and good morals. If a woman sees in her dream a difficult and painful birth and gives birth to a girl, this is an indication of the abundance of livelihood that she will obtain. And if a woman gives birth to a large girl, this indicates an abundance of livelihood according to Ibn Shaheen. The beautiful child that a married woman gives birth to in a dream and she was not pregnant in reality. A sign of kindness and good luck. Hugging a baby girl after she is born indicates that someone dear to her has been released from prison, and God Almighty knows best. The birth of a beautiful daughter in her dream is considered a good sign that news has arrived for her that is not sad. It may be a sign that she has given birth if she has not yet. I was born yet, for God is Most High and Most Knowing.

If a woman sees in her dream a difficult and painful birth and gives birth to a girl, this is an indication of the abundance of livelihood that she will obtain. And if a woman gives birth to a large girl, this indicates an abundance of livelihood according to Ibn Shaheen. The beautiful child that a married woman gives birth to in a dream and she was not pregnant in reality. A sign of kindness and good luck. Hugging a baby girl after she is born indicates that someone dear to her has been released from prison, and God Almighty knows best. The birth of a beautiful daughter in her dream is considered a good sign that news has arrived for her that is not sad. It may be a sign that she has given birth if she has not yet. I was born yet, for God is Most High and Most Knowing.
